0.3.0.en: Adds support for Motion Dimmer, Motion Switch, Smart Plug, 1-way socket, 2-way socket, Updated translations, Updated pairing instructions

0.2.0.en: Rewrite of all zigbee drivers to support SDK 3, Added support for Push button switch (WDE002476, WDE003476, WDE004476)

0.2.2.en: New paired devices with dimming capability will remember brigthness between on/off by default.

0.2.3.en: Added support for Z-Wave ZW_MTN50x6xx devices.
